properties.entry: SELECT vc_id , vc_date , vc_no , vc_purpose , vc_phone , vc_modifydate , vc_status , r_name , u_no FROM (select ROWNUM RNUM, VLIST.* from (select * from MEMBER_VISIT_HISTORY join member using (u_no) join info_resident using(r_no) where r_dong = ? and r_ho = ? and delete_status = 'N' order by vc_id desc) VLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
select count(*) from MEMBER_VISIT_HISTORY join member using (u_no) join info_resident using(r_no) where r_dong = ? and r_ho = ?
insert into member_visit_history values (VisitCar_seq.nextval, to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), ?, ?, ?, sysdate, sysdate, default, ?)
select vc_id , vc_date , vc_no , vc_purpose , vc_phone from MEMBER_VISIT_HISTORY where vc_id = ?
UPDATE member_visit_history SET vc_date = to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , vc_no = ? , vc_purpose = ? , vc_phone = ? , vc_modifydate = sysdate WHERE vc_id = ?
update member_visit_history set delete_status = 'Y' where vc_id = ?
